ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And Lut was one of the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Verily Lot was one of the apostles,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And Lot too was one of the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed Lut is one of the Noble Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily, Lut was one of the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Lut was most surely of the apostles.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Lot too was one of the Envoys;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! Lot verily was of those sent (to warn).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Lot was also one of the messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily Lut was of the sent ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed Lot was one of the apostles.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So also was Lut among those sent (by Us).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And verily, Lout (Lot) was one of the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Lot, too, was among the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And Lot was one of the messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, Lot was among the messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:133] And indeed Lot was one of the messengers;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo! Lot verily was of those sent (to warn)) his folk,
